createCard: INSERT INTO user_card (id, name, path, number, on_game, user_card, active, user_game_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, 0, 0, 0, ?);
setAsPlayersCardByUserGameIdAndNumber: UPDATE user_card SET on_game = 1, active = 1, user_card = 1 WHERE user_game_id = ?;
setAsEnemysCardByUserGameIdAndNumer: UPDATE user_card SET on_game = 1, active = 1 WHERE user_game_id = ?;
